title: Accra City Essentials Tour
description: Experience the vibrant heart of Ghana's capital. This tour covers the Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park, the W.E.B. Du Bois Centre, Independence Square, and the bustling Makola Market.

title: Cape Coast & Elmina History Tour
description: A profound journey into Ghana's past. Visit the Cape Coast and Elmina Castles, two of the largest remaining structures from the transatlantic slave trade.

title: Kakum National Park Adventure
description: Walk among the treetops on the famous canopy walk at Kakum National Park. A thrilling experience for nature lovers, offering a unique perspective of the rainforest.

title: Aburi Gardens & Craft Market
description: Escape to the serene and cool climate of the Aburi Botanical Gardens. A relaxing day trip topped off with a visit to the local craft market to find unique souvenirs.
